title: Organisation Supplier
description:
A HEALTHCARE ORGANIZATION (“HCO”) is a legal person (i) that is a healthcare, medical or scientific association or organisation (irrespective of the legal or organisational form) such as a hospital, clinic, foundation, university or other teaching institution or learned society or (ii) through which one or more HCPs provide services.
(See 100-BIP-00415 and HCCApp for additional local requirements: https://shareroom1.eu.boehringer.com/de/hccapp/SitePages/Home.aspx)
